title: The Incredible Adventures of Charlie Robinson
summary: Charlie Robinson discovers his ability to manipulate time during a week packed with teaching, helping, and saving his city from disaster.
summaryGerman: Charlie Robinson entdeckt seine Fähigkeit zur Zeitmanipulation in einer Woche voller Lehren, Helfen und der Rettung seiner Stadt vor einer Katastrophe.
summaryDutch: Charlie Robinson ontdekt zijn vermogen om tijd te manipuleren in een week vol met lesgeven, helpen en het redden van zijn stad van een ramp.
summaryFrench: Charlie Robinson découvre sa capacité à manipuler le temps au cours d'une semaine remplie d'enseignement, d'aide, et de sauver sa ville d'une catastrophe.

story.text: Charlie begins his week with an energetic presentation on new educational methods, unaware of the power brewing within him.
After a strange, eerie feeling throughout the day, Charlie accidentally reverses time by five minutes during a lecture.
Charlie experiments with his new abilities at home, feeling triumphant as he masters his power to rewind brief moments.
Using his powers subtly, Charlie helps a student overcome a tough personal challenge, feeling deeply peaceful and fulfilled.
A major accident in the city sees Charlie using his time-reversing ability publicly for the first time to save lives.
The news of his heroics spreads, and Charlie is invited to a romantic dinner by an admirer who learned of his brave deeds.
Charlie, feeling happy and accepted, spends a quiet day reflecting on his new role as a protector of the city.

ending: As the week closes, Charlie embraces his role as a guardian of time, ready to face whatever challenges may come.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility, and even the smallest moments can change the course of history.
